name: BallisticNG
description: Glide through futuristic race courses at breakneck speeds and eliminate those who stand in your way, make your own ships and tracks to share with the world. BallisticNG is an action packed anti-gravity racer with indepth modding support developed as a love letter to the original Wipeout trilogy.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or later (64-bit only) Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or later (64-bit only) Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
